This course is primarily a part of the MHLP program. MSN Students may be eligible to register with instructor permission. Please email student.services@nursing.ubc.ca for questions.
courseName: Topics in Social and Environmental Planning to Foster Health of Populations
description: Characteristics of social and built environments for their impact on the health of populations.
